website_summaries.verdict: Newborns, infants and toddlers will go wild for this jungle-themed play gym. Music, lights and more than 10 toys keep them delighted as they grow.
pros: Three different play options for lying on back, tummy time, and sitting up
Take-and-play toys, dancing lights and crinkly features keep baby entertained
Motion activated or long-play music settings
Mat portion wipes clean or can be machine washed
cons: Sometimes the toucan comes off a little too easily

customer_reviews.title: A Gift Parents and Baby Loved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas Gift for 2 month old Great-Niece had it deliver, it was a hit, better than expected the family had only wonderful things to say about the toy, perfect gift for new baby.
customer_reviews.author: mpnease

customer_reviews.title: Auntie approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece when she was almost 3 months old, and she loved it! Her favorite was the little flower mirror. This gym was the very first thing that really got her interested and engaged, and we loved watching her play with all the different interactive toys. She learned to swat at the hanging butterfly and grab the toy lion between her fingers and make the music play by kicking her legs. Absolutely love this gym, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was the older model
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was like the older version... it's not. My kids loved the lights right above them. Now there is a parrot that is on top that she can't even see. It also spring loads back open making storage a pain
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous to buy baby toys because sometimes they can be a total miss or just a quick fad & then never get used again but my 2 month old absolutely freaking LOVES this toy! She is all smiles & coos, kicking & moving around in every direction. Great for on her back which is her favourite, tummy time is full of fun & the little giraffe can detach & go along anywhere. This is worth every penny! Happy baby, happy parent!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why the bird is on the top and not underneath where the baby can see it, makes no sense to me.....
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars but having the toucan on the top is wrong. It should be underneath where the baby can actually see it. I can see it just fine but it's not for me, it's for the baby. Other than that it's really cute and entertaining for my grandson. The music has kind of a beachy feel to it, very upbeat and happy. I call it his Jimmy Buffett play mat (think Margaritaville) and bought him some Fisher Price maracas...lol
customer_reviews.author: Jo W.

customer_reviews.title: Great play set for infants to toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was silly that the company ad says the bird on top will become your kids favorite toy, but it actually did. This was great from the point when my granddaughter could lift her head to when she could stand up. After that it was a bit too light and became a hazard as she tried to pick it up and walk with it. We took the bird off, though, and she loves to dance around to the music it plays (I am seriously tired of that music!!). The rest of it packed away easily in a bag (after a good cleaning) waiting for the next grandchild. Hopefully the bird survives as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite place!
customer_reviews.text: This play mat gives my daughter about an hour of entertainment each day, about 20 minutes at a time. She loves it and has been using it now for almost 2 months. She loves the Kringle toy by her feet, reaches for the toys hanging from the top, stares at the big eyes, and stays entertained longer when the bird music is on and flashing. A baby must have.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good thing for the baby
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year old kid put it together for the baby, so you can say that it's very easy to assemble. The baby was only 2 months old when we got this baby gym for him and he wasn't sure about it first, but gradually started to enjoy it more and more every day. It's colorful, there are hanging toys and things for a baby to occupy himself with, you can change the positions of the toys, change the music... seems quite practical to me. Seems like it should be easy to clean, too. Little more expensive than other baby gyms, but it also has more functions than cheaper ones. So, overall, it' seems like a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Maria K.

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really quality for your money toy because it comes with so many smaller toys that your little one could spend hours with playing. I’m currently using it for my four month as a play mat and tummy time. She even did her first roll while laying on it so yay! She’s always sitting and playing with the hanging toys. The colors are very bright and attractive to keep her entertained and the toucan on top that plays music is such a bonus. I also love that it’s machine washable. No regrets here!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnell Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great play mat for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a different version of the fisher price jungle mat than my daughter had five years ago. The lights are on the top, and I think that should have been thought out a little better, they should be underneath the box at the top so that baby can see them. The mat itself isn’t extremely thick so I place a thin yoga mat under it so that it is more comfortable for baby on my hardwood floor. I bought the other version of this 5 years ago and loved it, this is pretty much the same as it was then, except the lights placement which I discussed earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Carranza

customer_reviews.title: The old version was 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This new version doesn't have as intriguing toys hanging. The most disappointing part is that the part that lights up is not very visible to the baby and even if it was, is not as bright and "attention grabbing" as the lights on the previous model. My first 2 babies had the previous model and both were more captivated by that model than my 3rd baby is by this model.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great!
customer_reviews.text: My son of 2 months is finally utilizing some of it's potential for some tummy time. My son loves the lights, and his favorite part of this "Gym" is the mirror. (Yeah he gets to see how handsome he is. Great product, my son loves it, my dogs loves it, my wife hates it because she has to clean it, but I love it because majority loves it? great tool, keeps the baby happy until he feels the urge to get up. I only wish it was slightly bigger as he will grow out of this probably by his 4th month.
customer_reviews.author: Kapitaljin

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. The top part is heavy and doesn’t stay secured, the top is not supported by the flimsy parts that are supposed to hold it up. In addition to that this thing was missing a part when it came. I guess that was a good thing considering the toucan could fall off and hit my baby. Two thumbs down!!! Very dangerous. I’m shocked that it’s being sold. I’m sure a lawsuit is coming.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT. Second time using the same one. That good:)
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my daughter who is not 8yo, and remember how AWESOME it was for her so I ordered it for my new little one. So excited! Parents: this thing is AWESOME! This keeps the baby entertained way longer than the other 2 that I had at the time. The lights and colors and music were enough to get things done (like wash bottles and bring in groceries) without fussing. I’m looking forward to using this again with my son now.
customer_reviews.author: Terah

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and toys
customer_reviews.text: The colors and toys with the mat are great! The only issues I have is the mat lifts up onto the bars really easily. The bird on the top is really hard to get snapped on. It is also hard to snap the bars together. I wouldn’t say it’s a deal breaker. It’s more of an inconvenience factor. I have also considered that the difficulty in snapping pieces together may be better for safety. My 4 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The attachable toys are great and the size of the whole thing is bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 month old and she has been loving it! The music and bright colors are very stimulating, and this has even made tummy time more enjoyable. The attachable toys are great and the size of the whole thing is bigger than my last round one, so I am loving it. For me, its worth the investment to have a happy baby, both during play and tummy time. Even my older children have loved to play around with it!
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaB

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah...not worth the money. Super cheap materials and toys hang in my newborn sons face. Wish I would have waited closer to my due date to order this as it would have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this one, its cute and the music is nice
customer_reviews.text: The best! It's been 8 months and we've washed the bottom several times, no rips or stains. The toys on it are great (especially the snail that rattles, that's our favorite). The music is great, it's island themed and not annoying and our girl has figured out if she crawls over and shakes the "arms" of the gym, it'll play music. We love this gym and I'm glad we chose it.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Simple but fun for babies
customer_reviews.text: For such a simple toy, my baby sure loves playing with it. She is entertained for a while before she gets bored and starts becoming fussy. The toys that attach can be easily switched in and out. The material is easy to clean if it gets soiled. It closes shut like a book for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment!
customer_reviews.text: This item is amazing! Not only is it great for tummy time but all the toys keep my little one entertained. Also, the big giraffe is a life saver. Honestly. I use it as a pillow when I’m super exhausted, and I have used it to help me breastfeed when I don’t have my boppy. I know it sounds weird but it’s the most versatile item I have. I’m probably more attached to it than my daughter will ever be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for us.
customer_reviews.text: We received an amazon gift card for our baby shower so we decided to buy this play mat and it’s been a hit! Our daughter started using it at 1 month old and she’s used it for around 15 mins a day ever since. She’s not super into tummy time but the mirror and the animals hanging above seem to keep her entertained as of now. I love all the features, the crinkle leaf, detachable animals, the rattle monkey. It’s bright, cheery and the music is cute too.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Carter

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: We had something very similar to this play gym for my daughter but we sold it at our garage sale thinking we wouldn’t have any more kids. I am so thankful we found this because our new kiddo loves it! It makes diaper changes more fun and he is enamored with the faces on the little animals! It’s a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Negative construction
customer_reviews.text: The bird topper is too heavy. It always leans slightly. If it falls your child will hurt because of the weight. The pad was useful for tummy time due to the colors. It still wasn't used as intended or as much due to the injury risk.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Play Gym that gets a lot of miles!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is THE toy at our house. My daughter loves it! She loves kicking the poles to make the music sound and enjoys batting at all of the toys. We had a kick n play piano but it was difficult for her to practice rolling over on it because she was constantly rolling off of the mat. This is a bit wider, allows her to roll around, and even makes tummy time more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Crazy adorable
customer_reviews.text: OK - this product is the BEST! I bought it as a shower gift for my daughter and she began using it when her baby was a month old. He has loved it ever since. The animals are bright and cute, and the baby can bat at them or grab them as he gets older. The music is upbeat and plays familiar children's songs. Great size and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Karin K.

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: nice colors , toys and the musical parrot are so adorable , it has many rethyms and 2 sound levels that are not too loud or noisy and my baby loves it . she got it when she was 4 months and spends a good time in it . update after washing the matt 24-november- 2019 I put it in the washing mashine on hand wash mode with no spin . it came out like new and the matt and colors did not get damaged or fade out
customer_reviews.author: Samir Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: My twins love this!
customer_reviews.text: I researched several different baby gyms and finally chose this one and I am so glad I did. My daughters are instantly mesmerized by the music and light up bird beak. I put very cheap batteries in this and they surprisingly lasted a long time. My daughters like all the toys that hang down as well as the giraffe. Great purchase and would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My child loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this gym. She will sit there for hours. I love all of the little animals that keep her entertained and happy. The only thing I would change is the main structure. It looks like it can collapse, but fortunately, it has not.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Patnugot

customer_reviews.title: Very entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a visiting grand baby who enjoyed it for the short time he was here. He really seemed to engage with it. I thought it was entertaining enough that, once my grandson left, I LOANED it to some neighbors who had a little baby. They moved and took it with them. Sigh.....
customer_reviews.author: caymanmom

customer_reviews.title: Batteries not included and you need a screwdriver to install the batteries in the Toucan
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I washed the mat and plush toys with Dreft. It was easy to assemble and now we’re ready for tummy/play time. Note: You need two AA batteries that are not included and will need to be purchased separately. You will also need a screwdriver to install the batteries in the Toucan for sound and lights.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old granddaughter loves this. She will lay and play with this for a good hour, seriously. Little pricey, but hey, if it keeps her busy, stimulates her mind and gets her reaching for the toys on it, it's well worth th price. Bright colors and well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wreck it Ralph loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is so colorful and so playful and the music on it so fun the macaw on top of it is just really playful, my grandson absolutely loves it he’s eight months old now so he’s like wreck at Ralph but it’s very durable and it’s really a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Teri Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice but you will need a bigger space for it
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute product and will do the job of entertaining baby and using for tummy time. I ended up returning it because i didn’t realize how much space it takes up. I ended up with something that I could fold in half easily and store in a closet when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, easy to clean and super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and durable little gym for a baby. Super easy to clean and so colorful. My baby would be mesmerized by so many cute stuff this has. Another plus is the fact that this is so easy to assemble. It was such a success, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debora B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Has lots of different toys. We love the monkey. Toys can be attached different places. Mirror can be attached anywhere on the arches. Toys make different sounds. Matt can be washed in the washing machine (worked great). Wish I could clean the soft toys easier. The music plays when it registers movement. Different settings for music and 2 volumes. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Nice play gym
customer_reviews.text: This play gym is pretty nice. My 3-month old twin boys find it pretty entertaining. I would have hoped it caught their attention a bit more than it does, though, but it is overall a good product. I also chose this one because it has enough room for both of them to lay under and play together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad !
customer_reviews.text: My son really like it. The only thing I don’t like is the mat! It is so light that I have to put a heavy sheet to make it soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Our little one loves this
customer_reviews.text: Our baby really loves this. She is very fascinated by the colorful mat and the other items attached to the bars. The bird is motion activated. So it starts making noises when she moves. We use this almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: HoomanDad

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and assemble. Lots of visual stimulation.
customer_reviews.text: Having so much fun in our new activity gym! Love how easy the bottom comes off to clean, and how many toys and visuals there are with it. Definitely one of my favorite ones that I have bought in my mothering years.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Hours of entertainment
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old twins love to spend hours under this gym, they kick it to turn the music on, reach of the different toys. I like the different music settings, and it’s great how many different toys came with is. It’s very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: it is very cute, but was hoping that the ...
customer_reviews.text: it is very cute, but was hoping that the mobile in the middle would actually turn by itself. Actually, doesn't really turn much manually either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We got so much use from this! The toucan plays songs and they don't want to make you rip your hair out. Very bright and colorful. My son loves the hanging monkey and lion that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg N

customer_reviews.title: Fun playful toy for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 week old really likes this when he is in the mood for playtime. He kicks and moves his hands and smiles. The music is nice and playful and partially why it is so pricey. I think he will like this one for awhile so thinking it is money well spent
customer_reviews.author: TB68

customer_reviews.title: My Son loves this Play Gym
customer_reviews.text: They had a very similar gym like this at my sons daycare. He was obsessed with the cute giraffe so I bought this one. He loves it! The tiger is one of his favorite toys. I just wipe it down with a wet wipe from time to time to keep it clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My LO had the activity piano mat and she was more interested in rolling and kicking things this mat is perfect! The bird keeps her occupied and there is so much to look at she gets so excited! She’s 4 months and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Suri

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our new grandchild. Easy to move from place to place. Musical toucan on top is a plus. She seems to really enjoy it and stays engaged with all of the little smiling faces. Would recommend as it was right for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this so much. We started her out at 8 weeks and at 14 she’s still not bored. But buyer beware, you’ll find yourself humming the tunes as you drive to work.
customer_reviews.author: Joco230

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my niece and she loves it. She started using after 3 months and she keeps playing it. I wish it had more toys for them to play but I totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many playmates for my children and this is by far the best! It features 4 hanging toys, two soft and two hard plastic, which is great because it allowed me to put my little ones head under only the soft toys at first while she learned to control her hands. The mat has just enough cushion for my hard wood floors but not too much that I would worry about her rolling and it causing difficulty breathing. Definitely an amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Moore

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it. Miss the way the older version lite ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Miss the way the older version lite up for them to look at. Not as sturdy, when the child pulls up on it, as the older version. The extra places to attach toys is better than before.
customer_reviews.author: J St. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Great for Infants!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Buy. Ever. I bought this for my 7 week old and she loves it! It is a wonderful interactive toy. She loves that the activity gym reacts when she kicks and moves. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Favorite a must have for us!
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite, we move the toys around and the Toucan plays songs that won’t make you wanna run it over in a day! we even take Mr Toucan down to look at during tummy time!
customer_reviews.author: LNDP1984

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: Love that all the accessories all machine washable! My little guy loves the attachment toys and the light up/musical bird on top keeps him interested and entertained!
customer_reviews.author: Oosh23

customer_reviews.title: I kinda feel like this product was a waste because the amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: I kinda feel like this product was a waste because the amount of time they could use it is so short. I used it for tummy time but the only thing my son was ever entertained by was the crinkly leaf on the bottom. Shortly after I got it he learned how to roll and wouldn't stay on it :( it's really cute to look at though. The only thing that got more than 2 weeks use was the bird on the top, but the music was so irritating lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Mom Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Holy cow. My daughter fell in love with it right out of the box. She’s 2 months old and this has been a life saver for getting some time to myself to get things done during the day. Highly recommend to any new mom 👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
customer_reviews.author: scott connors

customer_reviews.title: baby enjoys
customer_reviews.text: the songs are a bit irritating, but I may just be an irritable person. my baby seems to really enjoy this mat, especially the giraffe. she loooooooooves the giraffe!
customer_reviews.author: dancelover

customer_reviews.title: Check the faces
customer_reviews.text: This item comes with several animals. It is labeled Fisher Price but it didn't pass quality control very well. The lion came with an upside down face. it's still usable and we needed it but I expected better from Fisher Price.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it, I had the older version for my first one and I liked it better. This is great though because you can detach the bird in the top and take it with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Activity Mat
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loved it...it kept her busy looking at all the dangles and she was trying to reach for them and play with them...then she discovered the mirror. She was talking to it. Kept her totally busy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Rienzi

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old seems to be pretty entertained by the lights and music. The little animal friends are all detachable so they can go anywhere. Chances are we may get better use from it as he gets older and starts using his hands more.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Grump

customer_reviews.title: Fisher-price is 100 times better.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome play gym. Bought one cheap imitation here on Amazon and you can see it lacks things to stimulate baby's curiosity and engage them to play. Fisher-Price is much better. If you are adventurous like me, try the others but I am sure you'll see what I am saying here.
customer_reviews.author: Alfazon

customer_reviews.title: Durable and engaging for infants
customer_reviews.text: This is my second gym and I loved the first one. It has good jungle theme with some animals placed pretty nicely and neatly. The music is good and the gym stands upright. If possible there should be a feature to extend it when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: the Mat is bright and attractive and texture feels great! The suggestion to FP is to make the ...
customer_reviews.text: My little one ( 4 week old ) spends around 45 mins playing and looking at all attachments ... the Mat is bright and attractive and texture feels great ! The suggestion to FP is to make the lights a bit more larger to attract attention of newborns
customer_reviews.author: M.prime

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My babies love this thing. So many accessories that are fun and portable. Slightly smaller than the one i had for my first kiddo but that was 6 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, I really did. However, the bird on top is not visible to the baby (what a bad design!), and my daughter was crying when looking at the giraffe, I guess she was too big over her head. I shipped it back after a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kostas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My baby 4 month old is loving this toy, is very interactive, good size, it is so cute. Is very colorful and the sounds is perfect to my baby interact for long time with the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Bárbara Tótaro

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertainment and coordination.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for are 3 week old son. He enjoys looking at the attachments as his sister plays with them to make noise for him.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hardy

customer_reviews.title: I love it and the baby too
customer_reviews.text: I love this play gym. My baby plays with it for hours and she is 2 months. She likes to kick the giraffe to turn on the music as it is motion activated. I was glad with this product because it started her cognitive development.
customer_reviews.author: Shenjehan

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED FOR WHAT TOU GET
customer_reviews.text: OVERPRICED for what you get! The bird leans over because it's too heavy to sit up. If they want to charge a arm and a leg for this item, then they should at least make it so that the bird doesn't tilt over.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Amazing play mat with wonderful music.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this for all of my grandchildren and I have been so happy with it. I highly recommend this to any expectant moms. I bought this for a baby shower gift. She was thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Nana

customer_reviews.title: This is the best option
customer_reviews.text: It has all the basic things and appeared to be better than all the other buying options. We were very happy with this and you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute, and perfect for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: Item is beautiful full of many vibrant colors. It took me like 3 minutes to assemble, it's really that quick. It needs 2AAA batteries and they are not included.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great playmat !
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great tummy time mat . I bought it for my daughter & she absolutely loved it . One recommendation is to machine wash fold in delicate setting and air dry the mat .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Great for what it is, but my son likes the one with the piano in front of him better. This one is kind of boring unless your child is a little older then it’s a great place to play with toys.
customer_reviews.author: Elyssia M.

customer_reviews.title: Child loves this
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 months and loves this. When he kicks and pulls on the items it triggers the music and lights. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful gym
customer_reviews.text: My 7 weeks daughter loves this gym! We use it for her play time. The gym is colorful, has lovely toys (that my little one keeps talking to) and a removable toucan that has music! I had tried a different gym earlier but I like this one better.
customer_reviews.author: Matty

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great play mat for any child. I bought this for my daughter at 5 months old and she is still loving it 4 months later. The lights and music of the bird piece on top is attractive and the mat itself is colorful, softly padded, easy to assemble, and easy to clean. I have already recommended this product to a few of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Best playmat for your infant!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn son loves his new play mat , so many lights ,colors, and sounds. I have had one of these for each of my 3 children and this is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Yes!  baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to asswmble, removable mat allows for easy cleaning/washing, nicely made she loves it and it's a very nice quality, toucan is removable ...variety of music
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not worth $60
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and so does my baby, but $60 is just way too expensive for this.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and transport
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it! He was two when I got it for him and he absolutely loves the lion and the monkey. We had to use a velcro strap to hang the monkey because it's just a stuffed animal. He's not a big fan of the zebra or the snail yet but loves looking at the toucan light up! I love that its touch activated too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great funny square
customer_reviews.text: litle square look very confortable music is funny our baby like most. we love it
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Winner
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other play mats but this one is the only one that keeps my baby’s attention. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Marchese

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love that it responds to movement when little one kicks and waves arms. Not constant noise like some others. Pieces can all move around, you can add more of your own toys with clips too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Really really nice one, it will totally worth the price. My two months old loves to play on it and kick and wave, he loves the mirror too!
customer_reviews.author: chuanqi huang

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got so much use out of this. She still enjoys the bird that sits on top (it is detachable) and she is 16 months old! I have so many wonderful memories of my daughter scooting around on this mat before she could crawl and trying to reach the different hanging items. This was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my granddaughter. It’s easy to move from The PAC and Play to the floor. She loves it. Colorful and good music.

customer_reviews.title: Great first play thing
customer_reviews.text: Baby liked this alottttt. Very stimulating for newborns... First play thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: All around winner for baby and parents
customer_reviews.text: 3 month old loves it. Looks good (colorful but cute not garish), small footprint, very engaging, music good for adults and excellent for baby—especially the motion sensor aspect.
customer_reviews.author: j. livingston

customer_reviews.title: VERY ANNOYING
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does that y daughter, But the noises are kind of annoying... Believe it or not . So over it's pretty good! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby, happy mommy
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves this gym. Very colorful and fun. Lights and music are soothing. Simple to setup. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lao Girl

customer_reviews.title: We like it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! We have a Velcro baby who always wants held but he'll play in this! It's stimulating for him and not annoying for us. It comes with toys but you can easily change them out or add more. It plays music/sounds when the baby moves the toys or arches. It is also set up for tummy time so you can hook toys on for that and it has a crunchy leaf attached. In our opinion it's the best baby item we've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: JMWH

customer_reviews.title: 2 month old approved!
customer_reviews.text: 2 months old and she loves it. Lots of things to look at and motion activated so when she kicks a post, it keeps making noise. She’s been in it for almost an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: My Great Granddaughter loves this gym.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my great granddaughter who is 4 months. She loves it and reaches for the dangling toys. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Root

customer_reviews.title: The toys are fun for him and he enjoys tummy time on the ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this gym, there are lots of colors and noises that he enjoys setting off. The toys are fun for him and he enjoys tummy time on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Shannah O

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my grandbaby!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES this. The music is nice. You can play it long or short time. Very colorful . Great price
customer_reviews.author: Momma 5

customer_reviews.title: Engaging and simulating
customer_reviews.text: I order this item twice because we frequently go to our summer/weekend home and I got tired of carrying it back and forth. It is very engaging and stimulating and its perfect for photos. Many moms complemented it too claiming it was better then theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kopik

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product and my son is obsessed! He loves the sounds, animals, and mirror. It is great to play or for tummy time and washes easily. The different modes on the toucan are great too for changing volume or frequency of sound
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Our baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We love this playmat. It has lots of hooks for more toys. It has colorful lights and music.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute product. It is bright and colorful. My little grandson loves the music and all of the animals and other features.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia L

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Rainforest Music & Lights Deluxe Gym [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: Style:Frustration Free PackagingWith a third play setting and more than 10 toys & activities, the Fisher-Price Rainforest Music & Lights Deluxe Gym keeps baby busy as a bee, at home or on the go! The rainforest comes to life with music, lights and nature sounds that respond to baby’s movement. During lay & play time, hanging activity toys & motion-activated music encourage teeny-tiny ones to reach, bat & play...hello, toucan! Lower the toys or move them to the soft deluxe mat to encourage baby to push up for tummy time fun! Sweet details, including a soft, satiny mat border and large crinkle leaf, offer sensory development as your little one plays. And, for extra on-the-go fun, remove the take-along toucan, which features up to 20 minutes of music in the long-play setting as well as cool, color-changing lights! Go wild, baby!
feature_bullets: Frustration Free Packaging: Easy to open, 100% recyclable, and less packaging waste
Deluxe newborn gym with 10+ toys and activities and a removable, take-along toucan with music and dancing lights
Three ways to play: Lay & play, tummy time and take-along
Responds to baby’s movement with music and lights in short-play setting
Up to 20 minutes of music in long-play setting!
